00025 #include <FdoStd.h>
00026 #include <fdo/Schema/PropertyType.h>
00027 #include <fdo/Connections/Capabilities/ArgumentDefinition.h>
00028 #include <fdo/Connections/Capabilities/ReadOnlyArgumentDefinitionCollection.h>
00029 
00030 /// \brief
00031 ///  The FdoFunctionDefinition class contains metadata that describes a function and its arguments.
00032 class FdoFunctionDefinition : public GisIDisposable
00033 {
00034 protected:
00035 /// \cond DOXYGEN-IGNORE
00036     /// Constructs an instance of an FdoFunctionDefinition using the specified arguments.
00037     FdoFunctionDefinition(GisString* name, GisString* description, FdoDataType returnType, FdoArgumentDefinitionCollection* arguments);
00038 
00039     /// Constructs an instance of an FdoFunctionDefinition using the specified arguments.
00040     FdoFunctionDefinition(GisString* name, GisString* description, FdoPropertyType returnPropertyType, FdoDataType returnType, FdoArgumentDefinitionCollection* arguments);
00041 
00042     /// Constructs an instance of an FdoFunctionDefinition using default values.
00043     FdoFunctionDefinition();
00044 
00045     virtual ~FdoFunctionDefinition();
00046 
00047     virtual void Dispose();
00048 /// \endcond
00049 
00050 public:
00051     /// \brief
00052     ///  Constructs an instance of an FdoFunctionDefinition using the specified arguments.
00053     /// 
00054     /// \param name 
00055     /// Input the name of the function.
00056     /// \param description 
00057     /// Input a brief description.
00058     /// \param returnType 
00059     /// Input the function return type
00060     /// \param arguments 
00061     /// Input the argument definition list
00062     /// \param length 
00063     /// Input the number of arguments
00064     /// 
00065     /// \return
00066     /// Returns FdoFunctionDefinition
00067     /// 
00068     FDO_API static FdoFunctionDefinition* Create(GisString* name, GisString* description, FdoDataType returnType, FdoArgumentDefinitionCollection* arguments);
00069 
00070     /// \brief
00071     ///  Constructs an instance of an FdoFunctionDefinition using the specified arguments.
00072     /// 
00073     /// \param name 
00074     /// Input the name of the function.
00075     /// \param description 
00076     /// Input a brief description.
00077     /// \param returnProperty Type 
00078     /// Input the function return property type
00079     /// \param returnType 
00080     /// Input the function return data type (ignore it property type is not data)
00081     /// \param arguments 
00082     /// Input the argument definition list
00083     /// \param length 
00084     /// Input the number of arguments
00085     /// 
00086     /// \return
00087     /// Returns FdoFunctionDefinition
00088     /// 
00089     FDO_API static FdoFunctionDefinition* Create(GisString* name, GisString* description, FdoPropertyType returnPropertyType, FdoDataType returnType, FdoArgumentDefinitionCollection* arguments);
00090 
00091     /// \brief
00092     ///  Gets the name of the function.
00093     /// 
00094     /// \return
00095     /// Returns the name of the function
00096     /// 
00097     FDO_API GisString* GetName();
00098     /// \brief
00099     ///  Gets a brief description of the function.
00100     /// 
00101     /// \return
00102     /// Returns the description of the function
00103     /// 
00104     FDO_API GisString* GetDescription();
00105     /// \brief
00106     ///  Gets an array of FdoArgumentDefinition objects required for the function.
00107     /// 
00108     /// \param length 
00109     /// Output the number of argument definitions.
00110     /// 
00111     /// \return
00112     /// Returns the list of argument definitions
00113     /// 
00114     FDO_API FdoReadOnlyArgumentDefinitionCollection* GetArguments();
00115     /// \brief
00116     ///  Gets the FdoPropertyType of the function return value.
00117     /// 
00118     /// \return
00119     /// Returns the function return property type
00120     /// 
00121     FDO_API FdoPropertyType GetReturnPropertyType();
00122     /// \brief
00123     ///  Gets the FdoDataType of the function return value.
00124     ///  This is only valid if the function return property type is FdoPropertyType_DataProperty.
00125     /// 
00126     /// \return
00127     /// Returns the function return data type
00128     /// 
00129     FDO_API FdoDataType GetReturnType();
00130     /// \brief
00131     ///  Indicates that this object allows its name
00132     /// to change. This function is defined so that this class can 
00133     /// be a GisNamedCollection element.
00134     /// 
00135     /// \return
00136     /// Returns false
00137     /// 
00138     FDO_API virtual GisBoolean CanSetName()
00139     {
00140         return false;
00141     }
00142 
00143 protected:
00144     wchar_t*                m_name;
00145     wchar_t*                m_description;
00146     FdoReadOnlyArgumentDefinitionCollection*    m_arguments;
00147     FdoPropertyType         m_returnPropertyType;
00148     FdoDataType             m_returnDataType;
00149 };
00150 #endif
